css_selector_property.description: 选择器-属性 eg. [title="color"] ~=(has word), *=(has char) ,|=(begin word), ^=(begin char), $= (end char),

css_selector_property_char_end.description: 选择器-属性 property end with char eg: [title$="color"]

css_selector_property_char_begin.description: 选择器-属性 property begin with char eg: [title^="color"]

css_selector_property_char_has.description: 选择器-属性 property has char eg: [title*="color"]

css_selector_property_word_begin.description: 选择器-属性 property begin with word eg: [title|="color"]

css_selector_property_word_has.description: 选择器-属性 property has word eg: [title~="color"]
